text: Maga jevha savasrestha allaha tyanna vacavato tevha tvarita te dharatita nahaka utpata (phasada) majavu lagatata. He lokanno! Tumaca ha vidroha tumacyasathi duhkhadayaka tharanara ahe, aihika jivanace kahi labha aheta, maga (nantara) tumhala amacyakade yayace ahe. Tevha amhi tumhala tumacya sarva harakati dakhavu
